changelog: Performance: Optimized library checking - now fetches Sonarr/Radarr library once instead of per-item
Performance: Reduced API calls from 20 to 2 maximum (1 Sonarr + 1 Radarr) for Trakt cross-referencing
Performance: Implemented O(1) hash map lookups instead of repeated linear searches
Enhancement: Added 5-minute caching for library data to further reduce load
